findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The audit report did not provide a detailed description of this finding.

findings.title: Two minor problems that could have an impact in the future
findings.description: Two minor issues were found that may have an impact in the future but are not a problem currently.

findings.title: Replay signature with modified parameters
findings.description: An attacker can produce a different claimParamHash that matches the first 8 bytes to have a valid signature.
